author: j_d
title: Tells Time
review:
How to use

You push down on the whole thng to light up the display or snooze the alarm.

Slide the switch on the bottom to the right and use the hour and minute buttons to set the time.

To set the alarm slide the switch on the bottom to the left and use the hour and minute buttons to set the time.

Press the front right stud to turn the alarm on or off. 

Pros 

Tells time, lights up (not too bright or dim) and looks great in a lego themed room.

Cons

In my opinion it isn't tall enough to be the same proportion as a 2x4 lego brick.

I may be wrong.
